msg: TRINIDAD-2047 - merge onto this branch -- fixes issue with saving the stamp state when no stamping is in process

author: rhuijben
msg: (get_path_kind): Use svn_stringbuf_set()'s code for growing the buffer
instead of reimplementing that function locally.

author: jaz
msg: changed return invoice mapping, now when the return type starts with CUSTOMER_ the custoemer return invoice type is used; allowing for custom return. If it does not start with CUSTOMER it falls back to PURCHASE return invoices as it has previously
